title: 7 Tips to Organize & Build Your Homestead Food Storage & Kitchen
description: Learn how to organize your kitchen once and how that will help you build up your food storage and maximize your time and money. Why an organized kitchen is vital to a well run homestead and the exact steps and criteria to make sure it's working for you and your family, because it's all about customizing things to work for us.
content:encoded: Learn how to organize your kitchen once and how that will help you build up your food storage and maximize your time and money. Why an organized kitchen is vital to a well run homestead and the exact steps and criteria to make sure it's working for you and your family, because it's all about customizing things to work for us.
itunes:subtitle: Creating Food Storage on a Budget
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
